DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare safety efficacy OsmoPrep tablets versus HalfLytely Bisacodyl Tablet Bowel Prep Kit subject undergoing colonoscopy .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy OsmoPrep® Tablets Versus HalfLytely® Bisacodyl Tablet Bowel Prep Kit Colon Cleansing
DOC.criteria: Between 18 70 year age , inclusive Scheduled colonoscopy within 21 day screen visit Able swallow tablet size multivitamin without difficulty History biopsyproven acute phosphate nephropathy Known allergy hypersensitivity treatment arm History gastric staple bypass procedure history gastric retention History sodium phosphate preparation within 6 month prior colonoscopy
